last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the Ex-Addicts Club members seemingly going their separate ways, they scramble back in search of Kori as he drops clues about a mysterious plan.

name: Ex-Addicts Club
overview: Five individuals struggling to get over their past breakups come together to form an unusual support group.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A support group of five quirky strangers try to move on with their lives after breaking up with their respective exes.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Reeling from a painful breakup, Raysa forms a support group for the brokenhearted. A dubious spiritual guru is summoned to help them get over their exes.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In a mission to move on with their lives, the group makes an effort to get rid of their exes' belongings — which proves to be harder than they thought.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When Kori suddenly matches with a girl on a dating app, the group begins to have suspicions as they dig into her mysterious past.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Asep lies to his mother about meeting a new girlfriend, since she yearns for him to meet someone new — but with a sense of humor like his ex.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Tina flips her lid when a video of her ex goes viral. The group decides to open a tarot reading booth to keep her occupied — and calm her nerves.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When Kori mysteriously disappears on his birthday, the whole group reaches out to someone from his past to get him back.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: To help Kori move on from his ex, the group works together to find him a rebound. Kevin and Asep get competitive in prepping him along the way.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Raysa suggests that the group must make peace with their exes to find closure. Later, Kevin faces his ex after a video of him getting dumped goes viral.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Tina, Asep and Kori turn suspicious when Raysa appears to be neglecting the café. A covert investigation leads them to a startling revelation.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: With the Ex-Addicts Club members seemingly going their separate ways, they scramble back in search of Kori as he drops clues about a mysterious plan.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A support group of five quirky strangers try to move on with their lives after breaking up with their respective exes.
